summary: Fixes the instance where the carriage in Dawnstar added by CFTO clips inside the town wall added by Town Walls Of Skyrim
descriptionHtml:
[b]Fixes the instance where the carriage in Dawnstar added by CFTO clips inside the town wall added by Town Walls Of Skyrim.[/b]

I was quite unimmersed by this, so I did a quick edit in CK.
Hope someone finds this useful.

Also, just fyi, this removes one shrub and moves another just outside the Dawnstar walls, because they were in the way.

[i]Logically, this requires Skyrim, Dawnguard, Hearthfires, Dragonborn, CFTO and Town Walls Of Skyrim to work[/i]

[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68221/]Carriage And Ferry Travel Overhaul[/url]﻿ by [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/22750984]Kinaga[/url]﻿
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/31423]Town Walls Of Skyrim[/url]﻿ by [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/902742]Jerlord[/url]
author: MnNwr
